thread.section_title: NobleDEN Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, lovely hotel
thread.title_full: Great location, lovely hotel - Review of NobleDEN Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: amandaQP
title: Great location, lovely hotel
text: We spent 3 nights here last weekend and had a super stay. Morgan and his team clearly run the hotel very well and the service we received was excellent. When we visit NY we spend most of our time in the East Village so Nobleden is perfectly located for us. We had a king room - lovely comfortable bed, excellent shower and very clean. Without a doubt we'll return, it's an excellent hotel.
